(#{articleNo}, #{fileinfo.saveFolder}, #{fileinfo.originFile}, #{fileinfo.saveFile})
mapper.select:
select n.articleno, n.userid, n.subject, n.content, u.name, n.regtime case when date_format(n.regtime, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') then date_format(regtime, '%H:%i:%s') else date_format(regtime, '%y.%m.%d') end n.regtime from notice n, user u where n.userid = u.userid
order by n.articleno desc limit #{start}, #{spp}
